text:
Stood at the counter for 20 minutes while the employees joked with previous customers. Got acknowledged, i ordered one large pizza.
i was told it would be an hour so i asked if i could have it delivered instead, ‚Ä¶More

name: Lia Washington
text: The pizza was basically oily bread with cheese sprinkles. But the worst thing about it was the attitude of the employee we worked with. It was a man who looked to be in his early to mid-fifties, and when I made an inquiry on a Pizza Hut ‚Ä¶More

name: Lynn Ripperger
text:
I have not had good service in years at this pizza hut. Granted, I also gave up on this place a while ago.
The taste was not great, and the delivery service is not always timely. If you are in the mood for pizza in Indianola, you would have better luck looking elsewhere

name: Scott Turpen
text: I was very disappointed in there professional behavior of working in an establishment prided in customer service. My family and I waited on a pizza order with wings for an hour and when we called they said they were behind so then they told ‚Ä¶More

name: Neil Reuter
text: Placed an online order and said it would be 30 minutes.  12:05 hits and nothing. After waiting 20 min I call and they say they called me and left a VM saying they were out of wings and would I like to substitute.  I have no call or VM so ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Whalen
text: Good pizza but take the pizza to go or order delivery. The interior is fine but it is very obvious that people don't eat inside much.

name: overdonerug g
text: Worst experience at a restaurant ever. Waited 45 mins for food and still wasn't in the oven when we walked out.

name: mike keenan
text: Worst pizza and service ever received at a pizza hut. Rude, would not make it right. It closed permanently two weeks later. Will never done or take my crew to another pizza hut ever!

name: Gage Gioffredi
text: Highly recommend the food, highly recommend better service üëçüèª

name: Jason Irwin
text: small place but good pizza

name: Zak Huff
text: Worst pizza hut I've ever experienced. I have been here a number of times and each time mt order is wrong, not fresh, or I have to wait.  common for them to run out of items.

name: Shawn Isley
text: Service is always horrible and the pizzas aren't usually put together very well anyway. There are better options in town.

name: TargetTony1
text: Always great pizza and very good wings...

name: Hailey Kuyper
text: We had the buffet and the food was alright, nothing special, also not a lot of choices. The thing that really makes me give it a one is the restaurant was disgusting. We were the first ones in when they opened and the tables were dirty and the floors were nasty. It was like no one cleaned the night before.

name: Kevin Priest
text: Good pizza, fine atmosphere.

name: Joe Goodale
text: it's a good place to eat lunch buffet is where it's at

name: Montreal Flo
text: The worst Pizza Hut ever! Tried to order wings and they said their fryer is down. I've had many other problems with this place as well but this was the last straw. This place needs to either be out of business or under new management.

name: Eric Supinger
text: Horrible service, forget everything you say and they have messed up or we're late the past 3 times I've placed an order. I'm done with these guys.

name: Justin Barrett
text: Closed permanently

name: Michael Rosenberger
text: I think they are closed

name: Derek Dalluge
text: Disgustingly dirty and poorly prepared food. Waited a half hour longer than my carryout time said.

name: Zach Howarth
text: Good pizza, but occasionally they've messed up my orders and taken longer than I was promised when I ordered.

name: Richard Klein
text: I've had a very mixed experience here. There is usually very few people dining in, take out is extremely busy though. Food seems okay, but the whole place just has a dinge feeling about it.

name: Payge Newbury
text: Worst Pizza Hut ever

name: chase freeman
text: Ordered online, my pizza was a hour late, cold and When the driver finally showed up(apparently under the influence) he tried to call the store multiple times with no answer and he didn't even have everything I ordered

name: Gabriel Rawls
text: I called at noon, and couldn't get a delivery because they didn't have a driver there at the moment. Their delivery times say 11 am to 10 PM. Couldn't even get a pizza to rate it.

name: Darby Warnock
text: No wonder pizza huts closing all over the country

name: Brandon Horn
text: They sent me the wrong pizza and when I called them to ask for them to make it right by me the only concession they would do is offer to send me a new pizza that was a forty minute wait...super sucky
